panels.description:
### Bucket operations p99 latency
p99 latency of bucket operations performed by Warpstream read agents.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(warpstream_blob_store_operation_latency_bucket{namespace=~"{{ .Release.Namespace }}"}[$__rate_interval]))) and sum by (operation) (rate(warpstream_blob_store_operation_latency_bucket{namespace=~"{{ .Release.Namespace }}"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

panels.title: Bucket operations p99 latency
